nodes.text: The evacuation of Crait base occurred at some point before the Battle of Scarif when the Alliance to Restore the Republic evacuated their base on the planet Crait. In a message to General Jan Dodonna, Lieutenant Heff Tobber, who participated in the evacuation, noted that despite evacuating the base in a hurry, they left most of the facilities intact in the hopes of returning at a later date with heavy transport equipment.
